alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Livingston; Macomb; Monroe; Oakland; St. Clair; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 17 at 7:23PM EST until February 18 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times, will continue this evening with additional accumulations of 2 to 5 inches leading to storm total accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Livingston, Oakland, Macomb, Washtenaw, St. Clair, Lenawee, Monroe and Wayne Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...All locations will see heavy snow at times this evening with the peak snowfall rates occuring through 11 pm or so when snowfall rates of 1 inch per hour can be expected at times. The snow then looks to taper off around and just after midnight. Some minor blowing and drifting of snow will occur tonight with northerly winds gusting to 20 to 25 mph and temperatures falling to near 10 degrees toward Friday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Lenawee; Livingston; Macomb; Monroe; Oakland; St. Clair; Washtenaw; Wayne
